title: Add the use of microphone !
body:
I was wondering that your game is pretty awesome and while we play communication is the key to everything. Its true that you provide us with chat messages but voice message is more important for communication...more than 50% of online games support voice chat which is a very important thing.

so I would like to request to please considered my feedback and try to implement it on the game.

replies.body: Welcome to the ~~Xbox~~ league of legends voice chat, where you'll go deaf ten minutes in because of all the 12 year olds screaming about how they fucked your mother.

Bro they can also add a mute button for this
What do you expect then
Why other online  games are having voice chats too?
Think about it

Why is it a big deal? just download a voice tool and ask others to join, if they don't, they don't if they do they do.

Think about it.


I doubt riot will add another way for someone to be toxic, knowing how bad the community is... to this scale, regardless if you can mute or not.


Edit: imagine how most bronze games will go.

But why make it more complex by downloading other softwares just for voice chat
Why cant they just add it in their game only
It would be a lot easier rather than downloading some shitty softwares

Everything i just said answers your question.

Also, they have far more pressing matters to focus on than adding something that will make a bunch of kids shit talk each other, before some of the sensitive ones go to the boards to complain.


Also, it would be hard to report what people were saying as they aren't going to make it where everything said is recorded everygame. That will be a bunch of useless work that isn't even needed. 


Just download some voice software and use that.

Yeah, surely people will go through the entire process of joining another communication channel ~every ~ match... (sarcasm)

The mute button solution is so simple. I think most LoL players know how to press a button. And, on the positive side, the ones who decide to not be toxic and join the voice chat enjoy an easier communication. 

Many games have implemented voice chat and have been successful. Dota, for example, has a much smoother communication process. Sure, you get some toxic players every now and then, but then, again, the mute button is just 1 click away. You could even have the option of leaving it muted by default.

[]s

1. this thread was months ago, drop it.

2. league is far more toxic than dota, so u cant compare.

It's sad you went so far back just to comment on stuff
Whats the point of having mics then if half of your team is gonna be muted because they're being obnoxious?
They are actually in progress of implementing the voice chat if you read the last update on Ask Riot or Riot Pls or whatever it's called.
pls add the mic in this game cause I gotta talk, and i dont wanna type.
